Dialogues.DialogueLine: This is British Armed Forces Private Ben Matthew. Can't tell you how much of a relief it is to hear from someone!
Listen I'm stuck in Dunkirk, FR - pinned against the Nazis and the ocean with no present way out.
Most of us have managed to get out, but the rest of us are getting slaughtered out here.
Could you help me?
Oh! Great! I can't tell you how much of a relief it is to hear from someone on the outside! This is British Armed Forces Private Ben Matthew by the way.
Listen I'm stuck in Dunkirk, FR - we're pinned against the Nazis and the ocean with no present way out.
Most of us have managed to get out, but the rest of us are getting slaughtered out here.
Could you help me?
I am in a tall brick building, hiding out in a kitchen of some sort of restaurant or bakery.
I ran 5 blocks from the shore after I realized I wouldn't be able to get to the escape boats.
And that's when my squad got annihilated by German troops hiding out in the buildings.
What should I do now?
Yeah, after I realized I wouldnt be able to get on the escape boats, me and my squad ran back inland.

We were attacked by troops waiting in buildings. Friends left and right were knocked clean off of their feet. Somehow I just escaped, ran past them and then dodged behind the first building that looked unoccupied and when I couldn't hear the gunshots as close anymore'.
What should I do now?
What?! Man, we're wasting time here! The German troops are only 5 blocks away from me (between me and the ocean). I need HELP right NOW!
There's no time for this!
I can't remember every small detail when I've been focused on getting out of here! I need help! How can I get out of here?
Listen, all I know is people started rushing to those boats, and without explanation some of those went ahead and left...
There was some mention of troops being left behind so the rest could escape, but before any orders were given... German soldiers started coming out of the woodwork.
My squad, the 16th was the furthest back and got annihilated.
The sole reason I survived is by dodging to the left of the massacre and I just kept running...
Ran inland 5 blocks until I couldn't hear gunshots as closely.
Dove into this abandoned restaurant (or bakery?) building.
Now I'm hiding in the kitchen.
What should I do?
